entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is introduced as the one who sends a note to Professor Trelawney about an inspection. She has a wide smile and is described as emerging through the trapdoor in the floor.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is introduced as the one who is handing out Dream Oracles and books. She looks very disgruntled when Professor Umbridge arrives.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as elbowing Harry in the ribs, but he is not described in detail.

entities.name: dream oracle
entities.description: Dream Oracles are mentioned as being handed out by Professor Trelawney.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge sends a note to Professor Trelawney about an inspection, which is the reason for her visit.
Professor Umbridge has Dream Oracles with her, as she hands them out to students.
